DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective study include retrospective chart review major institution across Canada . The intent study generate regional national incidence data non-Candida invasive fungal infection ( IFI ) high risk participant . The study include participant receive stem cell transplant high dose chemotherapy treatment leukemia .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Fungal Infection Incidence Across Canada High Risk Participants With Hematological Disease ( P07501 )
DOC.criteria: To eligible study inclusion , participant must : A hematological malignancy require high dose chemotherapy without bone marrow transplant The participant eligible study inclusion : Their IFI relate hematological malignancy .
